name: Titanium.App.Properties
summary: The App Properties module is used for storing application-related data in property/value pairs that persist beyond application sessions and device power cycles.

events.name: change
events.description:
On iOS, the event is fired when the user re-enters the application after making a change using the Settings application.

The event is also fired when the application changes a property directly using one of the Ti.App.iOS.UserDefaults or Ti.App.Properties methods.

methods.name: getBool
methods.summary: Returns the value of a property as a boolean data type.

parameters.name: default
parameters.summary: Default value to return if property does not exist.

methods.name: getDouble
methods.summary: Returns the value of a property as a double (double-precision, floating point) data type.
methods.description: This method must only be used to retrieve properties created with setDouble.

parameters.name: default
parameters.summary: Default value to return if property does not exist.

methods.name: getInt
methods.summary: Returns the value of a property as an integer data type.
methods.description:
This method must only be used to retrieve properties created with setInt.

Use getDouble and setDouble to store values outside the integer data type range of -2,147,483,648 to 2,147,483,647.

parameters.name: default
parameters.summary: Default value to return if property does not exist.

methods.name: getList
methods.summary: Returns the value of a property as an array data type.

parameters.name: default
parameters.summary: Default value to return if property does not exist.

methods.name: getObject
methods.summary: Returns the value of a property as an object.

parameters.name: default
parameters.summary: Default value to return if property does not exist.

methods.name: getString
methods.summary: Returns the value of a property as a string data type.

parameters.name: default
parameters.summary: Default value to return if property does not exist.

methods.name: removeAllProperties
methods.summary: Removes all properties that have been set by the user on runtime, or does nothing otherwise.

methods.name: removeProperty
methods.summary: Removes a property if it exists, or does nothing otherwise.

methods.name: setBool
methods.summary: Sets the value of a property as a boolean data type. The property will be created if it does not exist.

methods.name: setDouble
methods.summary: Sets the value of a property as a double (double-precision, floating point) data type. The property will be created if it does not exist.

methods.name: setInt
methods.summary: Sets the value of a property as an integer data type. The property will be created if it does not exist.
methods.description: Use getDouble and setDouble to store values outside the integer data type range of -2,147,483,648 to 2,147,483,647.

methods.name: setList
methods.summary: Sets the value of a property as an array data type. The property will be created if it does not exist.

methods.name: setObject
methods.summary: Sets the value of a property as an object data type. The property will be created if it does not exist.

methods.name: setString
methods.summary: Sets the value of a property as a string data type. The property will be created if it does not exist.
